channel.title: Mukesh Ambani on SpashtNews
channel.description: Recent content in Mukesh Ambani on SpashtNews

item.title: Jio: Creating disruption in the telecom industry
item.description: Digital revolution is growing at an exponential pace in India. Chairman and Managing Director of Reliance Industries, Mukesh Ambani, left no stone unturned to be a part of such exponential growth.
